attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The National Youth Service will help to structure the life and attitude of our young people. The increasing level of gun and knife crime among young people calls for radical action. 

The National Youth Service should be run by the Army and the Police. It should include low key military training, police training, community services, antisocial behaviour training sessions etc. Training sessions should last for 6 months and should be for young people after completing primary school and for another 6 months for those who have completed secondary school after year 11 before going to higher institutions.

Appropriate Community and Military training can affect or change attitude and behaviour. 

Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
